content.detailedDescription: Driving south on washington st denver. i caught sight of what looked like a jet at aproximately 30,000 ft. but as i looked at it, i realized this was not a jet because it had no wings. i watched it a few minutes before it vanished in the sky. this is the second time i have seen this type of uap. it was shiny metallic with sunlight reflecting on it. its body was long like a jet. there was no vapor trail. i was in my car driving so i could not detect any noise.
content.summary: The first one was bullet like. second one was orb or star-like

content.detailedDescription:
As i was filming some planes that day, nothing really seemed unusual. i was in "trier - germany" on the parking of a supermarket.
but as i was watching the material at home , in one video , i was surprised seeing 4 or 5 white dots crossing the screen.
my first impression was that my camera caused those dots, but as i watched the about 40minutes footage , hey never appeared again.
after watching the video several times, i seems to me , that those "dots" where in the sky , fyling. 
so they dont seem to be reflections , because 1. i never had them in my videos ever before. 2. the sun was in the other direction. 3. one object seems to dissapear in the cloud , and in the next frame it reappears behind the cloud.
i cannot say that those are aircrafts , because they must have been faster than any aircraft i would know. the only aircrafts which im concerned of , would be some like the black bird. but the black bird is black , and i would have heard it. 
i have one frame , showing a clear picture of a disc shaped metallic looking object which i isolated in my videos.
i was pretty surprised when i watched the footage.

here are the videos:

*(three links moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg).

i hope to get your interpretations of them.

thank you

with friendly greetings.
content.summary: Very very very fast

content.detailedDescription:
I just finished work at around 3am in the morning. my mate and i went around the back outside to collect our bikes to ride home.

before heading off we were talking about plans for the weekend. while talking i noticed the moon in front of me. i was looking up at a 65 degree angle and marvelling at how bright it was. hold a tennis ball at arms length to get an idea the size it looked to me.

it was around 20 minutes later when i told my friend to turn around and look at the moon. i said ���i can't believe how bright the moon is tonight; check it out" he just kept looking at me with a smirk. i told him again and his reaction never changed. so i asked him ���what's the matter, why won't you take a look���. he laughed and said "the moon is behind you, idiot".

i slowly turned around and there it was the moon. to say i was in shock is an understatement. even before i turned around to fiercely gaze at what i thought was the moon, a rush of thoughts when through me, like what the hell is that thing if not the moon?

i turned around and yelled to my mate" turn around now and have a look at this thing behind you. he thought i was playing games or something because he refused to take a look behind. i was absolutely frantic telling this guy to turn around and look at this thing. 

i closed the gap between us and grabbed his shoulder to force him to take a look. and just like good old murphy���s law the object blinked out just as he was turning to look.

the object blinked out but it didn't just disappear. it was still there blended almost entirely with the darkness. the sky was black, no clouds and full of stars. this object which i now know was an orb was exactly where it was before the light blinked out. after staring at it for 15 seconds the orb began to move laterally across the sky. heading north at about 15 knots before i eventually lost sight of it.  because i am partially deaf i rely more on my eyes and naturally see more details because of my deafness. if i didn't look so hard for it after blinking out i would have simply thought it had just disappeared.

some facts-
1. i would say the orb was about 100ft from my position looking up at a 65 degree angle. 
2. the orb's colour when lit up was the purest white i have ever seen.
3. the orb appeared to be a very dark grey when the light blinked out. 
4. the only way to describe its appearance at this time, it looked like a rock in the sky. it didn't look as though it was floating but more of a fixture. and it moved at such a perfect lateral angle that one would think it was on a railway track
5. there was definitely no sound coming from its area of position - stationary or when moving.

i told my friend that i just witnessed a ufo and he laughed at me. to my satisfaction dozens of people reported seeing a ufo that morning. this made it in the local newspaper, but only a small article.


when i realized the object was not the moon, my first thought was it had to be a ufo. i know it wasn't a plane, helicopter, blimp, meteor, venus, swamp gas, weather phenomena or mass hallucination. this was something so out of the ordinary for me that the only way to describe the feeling would be to see k9 walk up on stage and start singing elvis presley songs. it really blew me away and opened my mind to the possibilities of reality.
content.summary: Chatting to a friend outside i realized after 20 minutes that the moon was in fact something out of this world

content.detailedDescription:
Morphing disc found......! 

i was having my morning coffie and this idea came to me ?
search the skys. i did and found 10 disc at different points in the universe in the same galaxy milkyway.
the disc morphs and seperates into crafts
 4 pods and multipul parts i have seen  4 rings or loops they may use to lock when they doc ? i have photos of half disc as well seperated from the disc....

colors : blue grey , neon blue, translucent. 

these photos are prof.....(o)
i have been on it for a week and have found a very interesting 
beautiful awseome univers .!!!
 video of neon blue vapor trail
content.summary: neon blue disc found while seaching the skys

content.detailedDescription: At about 9:30 pm, i was walking from a neighbor's house to stay the night at a friend's place down the street. as i came to a three way intersection, maybe about twenty(20) feet from my neighbor's front yard, i looked up at the horizon to see if i could spot any constellations. while i was looking, i saw a large object move rapidly across the sky. it was teardrop shaped, and very bright, almost like the sun except it didn't give off any ambient light. it only took about five to ten seconds to move across the sky. i don't know how fast it was actually travelling, but it was going too fast to be any conventional aircraft of my knowledge, an it certainly did not behave like a flare or firework. i didn't know what the object was at first, but i just shrugged and continued walking to my friend's house, slightly confused and wondering exactly what i had just saw. it was one of the strangest things i'd ever seen.
content.summary: Saw a large, bright light moving quickly across the horizon. object disappeared behind a medium-sized hill

content.detailedDescription: Watch the skies tonight, between 6:45pm and 8pm. wont be dissapointed. watched them last nigth for 20 minutes. they seem to come and go for days at a time. haven't seen them in months, when they show up they show up for several days in a row. if you haven't seen them yet you'll be amazed, i promise. been watching these odd lights for 3 years now. please watch the skies.
content.summary: Orange lights

content.detailedDescription:
Several of we children were outside on a hot summer's night back in 1968 when we saw lights coming from behind a hill.  we watched as the object climbed from behind the hill, then hovered for several minutes on the side of the hill facing us.  there was no noise.  it then, slowly, made it's way back to the other side of the hill.  we could see the lights flashing from the hilltop.  then there was nothing...No lights, no sound..Nothing.  

i might mention that there were no roads or houses on the other side of the hill.  it was essentially wilderness area.  it was like nothing i and the others had seen, and like nothing i've seen since.  i recently asked a lady who was one of the ones who witnessed what we saw that night if she remembered it, and she did.  "at least i'm not going looney" is what i thought when she said she remembered.  that was over 40 years ago.
content.summary: Diamond-shaped with rotating green, blue, and red lights at the bottom part of the diamond

content.detailedDescription:
This account is still so vivid in my mind. an original accoount was made and a mufon investigator came to my house at the time and took a deailed description of the event. the only detail i cannot fully recall is the exact time of summer during which this occurred. i never heard back from mufon as to what might have been done in terms of an investigation, nor any findings that may have been uncovered.

as i sit here nearly twenty years after the fact, this event took place on a cool summer night, about 1:30 in the morning, returning from a visit with a cousin and her family's home. i had taken no alcohol, drugs, prescribed, illegal, or over-the-counter.

i was nearly home, out in the countryside amongst the dairy farms and a small cluster of homes, on the approach to the road on which my house lay. the road was a mildly steep, longish right-hand curving road, leveling out at the bottom. i was traveling in a southerly direction on sr 54/horner church rd. at the bottom of the hill, on the right was the turn-off to my road, mcvicker rd. the intersection of the two roads lay at the bottom of this long arcing road, with an old county home standing back about 150 feet from the sr 54, with a long row of older pines fronting the property. where the trees stopped, the long, steep, unpaved road(mcvicker) began on the right. on the opposite side of the country home was another smaller home fronted by a few trees and tallish brush, about 75-85 ft from the road side. 

on the left, just past mcvicker stood a working milking parlor. directly opposite it, on the far side of mcvicker, about one hundred feet up that road, stood another home. as the entrance to mcvicker came upon one with little visibility, it was necessary to decelerate to a near stop in order to make a safe turn onto the deeply rutted road was mcvicker. it was at the point of deceleration when i first became aware of this light. it did not belong there and seemed to be hovering directly over the last-mentioned home. at its dimmest, it was bright, white, and pulsed, or throbbed to a much brighter intensity. as it pulsed, its size appeared to grow. i stopped my car, looking from house to house to try and notice any activity from any of the other homes. not seeing anyone, i rolled down the window completely, trying to hear any prop or engine noise. failing that, i put the car in park, timidly exiting the vehicle, still looking around for others who might be witnessing the same activity. i still heard no noise; mechanical, engine, animal or insect. at this point the light began to slowly move in straight line paths,stop and hover briefly, never ceasing to pulsate. its general direction was toward the barn, then beyond it, up and over the hillside and treeline at the top. yet it did not move in a seemingly natural manner. instead of moving in a direct pathway, it would slowly move in straight line paths, come to a complete stop, hover a bit,abruptly alter its direction, but continue roughly toward the east, southeast; never ceasing the pulsating light. i stood, transfixed during the entire duration of maybe twenty minutes until it was out of view.

quite suddenly it dawned on me that i was standing there, alone and unprotected. so, i dashed the yards back to my vehicle, rolled up the windows, locked the doors, and made the right up mcvicker, traveling at a much too quick pace for the rutted road condition. my house was at the first flat of he hill, on the right, with the only neighbors over three hundred feet away, not visible through the trees separating us. i quickly made the right into my drive, up the hundred or more feet, and opened my door to get out. as i had to retrieve a bag of groceries from the back seat, i needed to turn around. in so doing, there was the light(or a different light but looking and acting the same) directly across the road, hovering in the clearing that was at one time an old saw mill.

at this point i became absolutely terrified, and quickly extracted my groceries, made certain my dog and cat came indoors and abruptly ran around the house closing doors and windows, pulling down blinds, tacking up sheets-doing whatever i could to make it as closed to visibility from the outside as i was able. i turned out all lights and went upstairs, gathering my animals with me, heading for the windowless walk-in closet upstairs. there were several windows placed where i could do nothing to cover them. i had a distinct impression that i, once the observer, was now the observed,and that unsettled me to the point of writing a leer about what had happened and placing it somewhere safe, yet out of view. 

after what seemed hours(yet was less than thirty minutes), i went out to the bed to grab a pillow and blanket, and saw the light traveling in the same manner, up beyond the next tree line, near the top of the hill bordering the mennonite farmhouse beyond. the light was now moving toward the east, and it was far enough away that i felt safe enough to watch as it moved over the hillside, out of view. i did, however spend the rest of the night in the closet, doing my best to sleep.

several days later, i contacted a cousin of mine in the eastern part of the state who put me in touch with mufon. i don't recall the name of the gentleman who came to take the report, but do recall he was new and i believe was making his very first field report. i never heard back from them, yet it has since been on my mind
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Pulsating ball of light

content.detailedDescription: I went to tucson arizona to visit my brother for two weeks.As for the aproximate dates.I will have to find it in my emails somewhere and get back with you on that. im going to say it was about 10pm/or after.I went outside to smoke a cigarette before going to bed.I sat down and it was very nice weather.No clouds in the sky,the moon and stars were out.It was a very clear night.And i sat looking out toward the mountains.After a good ten minutes or so.I noticed lights coming toward me.I thought it was a plane.And it was coming directly toward me.I thought at least i got something to look at. the plane gonna pass right over me.As i was watching it.It was coming toward me.So i was just looking around at other things and id look back at the lights.Several minutes went by.And then i thought.That plane should of had reached me already.As it got closer.I noticed it was in a large -v- shape.And it was moving very slowely.I then knew that it could not be a plane.As it got closer i noticed that it was huge.The white lights along the sides were steady.And it was just gliding very slowely.My god i thought it cant be a plane.The plane should of went over me along time ago.Thats what made me notice the object.I was not scared at all.I was more curious then scared.As it got closer it was even bigger than i thought.And very slow.Several more minutes went by.It was then getting closer.I then walked to the middle of the yard and i noticed that it was about two football fields in length if not a little smaller.Thats the only way i can tell you how large it was.And was just gliding very slowely.As i was looking at it.I also noticed it was very close im gonna try and say how i can only describe it..I have a tree in my yard which is about 75-feet..Im gonna say it was about 6-of those trees high up in the air..Thats the only way i can describe it.It was very close.I then tryed to hear any kind of sound or motor running.And i heard none at all.It was complete silence.As it was about to go right directly over me.I moved right to the middle of the yard.And it went right directly over me.No sound at all.And just gliding right over me.I watched it go over me.And it kept gliding straight ahead and just watched it go pass and pass the other side of the mountains and it was gone.Scared no i was not scared at all.Very curious.And to this day i am still wondering what it was.
content.summary: Large -v- shape.Steady lights running down each side all white

content.detailedDescription:
I live in north las vegas, nevada and in the beginning of last august for a week i saw a metallic round object appearing and disappearing in the sky around the park where i take my walks every day around 9 am to 10:30 am. i told my husband when he went to walk the dog to please check the sky around that area also because i thought i was loosing it. that friday my husband came back to the house all excited because he saw it as well. we decided to ask our son ,since he has a video-camera, to come with us on a family ufo hunting picnic, to see if we could see the object and film it. that sunday morning we got there at 9 am, we saw the ufo five times. my son got it on video twice and exactly what we saw is the video i am sending you. i'm not saying it is ours and i'm not saying that it is not ours i'm saying that i don't know. what you are going to see in the video is exactly what we saw. i would appreciate it if you would be so kind as to give me your opinion. 

thank you for your time and effort.
content.summary: First ufo family sighting

content.detailedDescription: It was august 2009 and my father (age 53 at the time), my brother (21), my boyfriend (29) and myself (24) were house sitting for my boyfriend's sister. her home is isolated and sits atop a mountain outside northumberland, pa. it is surrounded by trees which frame an outstandingly clear view of the sky. we were inside the house, chatting and finishing dinner (about 9 or 10 0'clock) when we heard a very strange sound, a low roar that lasted no more than a few seconds, but was quickly followed by what we thought was an earthquake. the house is huge by anyone's standards, 3 floors, 5 bedrooms, 5 bathrooms, and built solid. it would take quite a natural force to shake the whole thing. the vibration was enough to rattle items on shelves, but it lasted only a second or two. we were startled because the weather was beautiful, no clouds or rain or wind. it was a perfect summer night. we didn't know what to make of it, so we went about our business, clearing dishes and then stepping out onto the upstairs patio to enjoy the night. we hadn't been outside for long when i noticed a strange "star" in the sky. i thought i had seen it move, so i watched it. it began turning different colors - red, green, white, blue- so i quickly pointed it out to the others. they picked it out of the sky right away and the four of us watched as it moved, ever so slightly, as if it were hovering in place. the lights came and went, and almost looked like they were rotating, as if the object they were attached to were spinning. we were all pretty convinced that this was not a star that we were looking at, when it started darting in short spurts. it would hover, then dart to the right, then up, then back to it's starting position. it didn't travel far in these spurts, but it was moving in ways that no plane could. we were utterly convinced that this was something none of us had seen before. we watched, in awe, for about half an hour - all of us staring at the sky, unable to explain what we were seeing, when all of a sudden, it disappeared. just like that. all the rest of the stars in the sky were visible, it wasn't a cloud. it just...Vanished. we all kind of gasped and cursed and got excited when it suddenly reappeared in a completely different region of the sky. we didn't witness it traveling to that spot - but we should have. it was inexplicable. it hovered and darted in that spot for about a minute when all of a sudden it flashed a bright light and began coming toward us! i know this sounds unreal, and maybe that's why i've kept our story between the four of us and a few close friends for 2 years, but i swear to you that this next experience has changed all of our lives forever. we cannot explain what we saw. we saw the bright light, and then we saw this giant, black mass coming right at us. i will never know how it traveled from a distance relative to stars to the rooftop so quickly. it was literally seconds. we all kind of screamed, watching the light get closer, but never taking our eyes off of it. it came so close that we thought it would begin to knock over treetops or crash into the house. the object we saw was enormous. it dwarfed the house and the property and was the blackest black, with no details visible except for a few orangish white lights on the bottom. it was shaped like a guitar pick and it seemed as if these dull lights were placed in the corners of the triangle. it was traveling fast and made no sound. it is impossible for something so gigantic to fly. it is even more impossible for it to do so silently. as it flew directly over the house, i ran inside, through the house and out a door on the opposite side to catch the rest of it's descent. i saw the mass, but it was so low that i lost it to the trees as soon as it passed. we were hysterical. my father and i were yelling, excited and scared at the same time, recounting what we has just seen. my boyfriend was quiet, stunned, not sure how to react. my brother solemnly whispered "holy f*&#, that was the starship enterprise", not trying to be funny, but in a reflective, shocked manner. we all went over the sequence of events a hundred times that night, and probably hundreds since then. we assumed no one outside the house would take us seriously, so we kept it to ourselves. the family and close friends we did tell gave us pitying looks and offered up explanations like 'planes' and 'search lights.' that is not even close to what we saw. we are all level headed, educated people, and we were the first to try and debunk what we were seeing, but we could not. this experience has changed our lives, and i think that we are finally ready for real answers and real input. was the strange sound/shaking of the house related to what we saw? why did it come so close to us? where did it go? did it land? how could it have been so big? what was it?? it has taken me a year and a half to share my story, but i have thought about this every day. i live not even 2 miles from where this sighting took place, and have since witnessed other ufo activity which i would happily share with anyone who is interested or willing to offer answers, but what happened on that night is the most haunting experience of my life. i need to know what we saw.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 4 witnesses-strange moving light in sky turned into close encounter

content.detailedDescription:
My name is *(wit's first name deleted--cms/sg). my son had just went up stairs to bed and i was up playing games on my xbox. it was an normal night and i was staying up late like i always do. about an hour after my son went to bed (11:00) i dosed off. i woke up when i herd a loud thud. the clock said 2:34. i saw some lights and thought someone had invaded my home i grabbed a bat and went to check it out. i saw a upright being in the back yard. it was standing it beckoned up to the sky and two more thuds followed. i walked out the back door and saw that the intruders had large gun like objects attached to what appeared to be there suit they had helmets that were round. i spoke they said nothing. then they grabbed me by the arms and the next thing i new i was flying threw the air and i landed on a ship the people tried to make contact with me. the one that was no doubt the leader made contact with me via prerecorded conversations and playing them and replaying them. it told me that they would let me go back to my house to pack my things if they did not find it harmful. i went back and got my laptop and a few other things. they stopped and looked at my laptop and said that it was not harmful. i am writing this from my laptop the only connection i have with the rest of the world as we know it. there were other humans on the ship i made contact but they were very scared. i was taken to a armory and suited up like the others. i now live in this suit. i have gained the trust of the other life forms and there next stop point is earth. i think that they have built an army out of humans and will drop us to earth in a small shock proof pod.
they have run tests that make it possible for them to control the suit and  us in the suit. in this way if certain humans do not comply they will control the suits for us. this is your warning help save the human race and stop this.
content.summary: Large, almost no lights, had door on side and four rocket like thrusters.

content.detailedDescription:
It was valentine's day, february 14th, 2011.It was around 2:00 - 2:30 pm.

 i seen something, i don't know what they were but they didn't have wings or a tail, they were silver and large like 747's and they went straight up, and when i stretched back in my chair to get a better look at them they appeared flat...They went up into a cloud and disappeared, no chem trail...Nothing just gone.

1.) where were you and what were you doing at the time? i was sitting at my kitchen table taking a break from my housework. i was looking out my carport door which faces a horse field owned by the air base.

2.) what made you first notice the object? the way they lifted off from behind the tree line-about 1 1/2 miles from my carport door. the runways are about 5 miles from my home.

3.) what did you think the object was when you first noticed it? i thought it was planes. 

4.) describe the object and it's actions and motions. there was 2, they appeared to lift directly off the ground rather than a forward uplift. the closest being further behind than the second one-they were silver , like aluminum, no markings and no lights. the top tips looked smaller as in bullet shaped, they were very large, like 747's, no wings and no tails. i stretched back in my chair to get a better look at them and they appeared flat, at that point they looked to be in perfect unison-side to side with a little distance between them. i watched them disappear into the clouds and they did not come back out. no chem trails...Nothing. i watched from my carport door several more minutes and seen nothing else of them.

5.)describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object. during the sighting i just felt like...What the heck was that? after about an hour i felt slightly depressed and on edge for a few hours.

6.) how did you lose sight of the object? they went into the clouds and never came back out.
content.summary: I could swear i seen 2 flying saucers leave the air base and disappear in the clouds ...They looked like silver bullets

content.detailedDescription:
I was just out driving my friend home who lives down the street from my house. as i turned onto my street something caught my eye. i looked up and saw what looked like a frisbee in the air and i didn't really think anything of it. then i realized it was maybe a hundred or two hundred feet up and keeping a steady height. so instead of going home i followed it and saw that it was a red disc almost like one of those automated vacuum robots. it was completely silent, i rolled down my window to hear it and it was pretty close over my head. it was probably only a few feet in diameter and it was traveling horizontally, not vertically meaning it was not a balloon. it also didn't shake in the wind, it moved flawlessly but it wobbled as it flew, almost like when frisbee or disc is wabbling on the ground. what also caught my attention is that it was flying literally over the same streets and area as the only other ufo i've ever seen.

i am completely baffled at this one because when i saw it i figured it had to be fake but i ruled out every possible option as i was following it. there didn't seem to be any features on it. it was close enough so that i could tell it had a smooth red surface. i'm going to search red wabbling disc videos and pictures that look like it so i can give you guys an idea of what i'm talking about.

i lost it after about 45-60 seconds when i got to the bottom of the street because it was a dead end. i turned right to go to my friends house as i was calling him so it was behind me and when i stopped and got out to look for it i couldn't see it anymore but it would make sense because of it's size.

yes i did think of taking pictures but no i didn't get any. that was actually the first thing i thought of and i was about to run home first to get my moms good camera but i didn't want to lose it so the only camera i had was my lg rumor camera which is absolutely terrible and is actually the same camera took the terrible pictures in thread i linked to. although the disc was close enough and big enough in the sky so that it would have captured it but my memory was full and my battery was about to die so it unfortunately wouldn't let me take pictures...

just a side note, when i called my friend as this was happening, the phones kept cutting out and lost signal multiple times.

i attached a picture of an irobot automated vacuum. it looked like this but it had a larger diameter.
content.summary: A frisbee in the air

content.detailedDescription: As i pulled into my parking space at work i looked to east. the sun was just comiing over the horizon. as i looked away something caught my eye. it was a small whitish or silver colored oval.It was hard to tell at the distance i was viewing it from. it stayed exactly still in the sky. i work within a quarter mile of hopkins international airport so i am very used to what planes of all sizes and helicopters look like at that distance. this was definately neither of those. i then thought it was a star or planet. but when i looked around i realized it was too bright to still be seeing a star, planet or the moon. it was the only point of light visible in the sky. i proceeded to watch it for approximately four minutes. at that point the object simply vanished from sight in an instant. almost like someone blew out a candle. being so close to the airport you learn the incoming and outgoing routes of the aircraft. the object was in a part of the sky where aircraft dont circle or come in for landing. the only reaction i had was that there was no way i was seeing what i was seeing.
content.summary: Whitish/silverish orb

content.detailedDescription: Riding 4 wheeler at the deer lease in san diego, texas.  saw bright orange lights, 3 oval shaped objects take off in one direction, two in another. stopped riding the 4 wheeler and just watched them in the sky.  then lights go off, and come on again further out blinking simulataneously. i yelled to my friend who was in another location, he say two what described as "fireballs".  did not have my cell phone at the time.
content.summary: 5 in a cluster, then 3 take off one direction and two in another

content.detailedDescription: It was night and my kids and i were just getting things cleaned up in the house when my 9 year old went outside to take the trash out when he  came running in yelling for me to come outside he sees a ufo. i told him to stopped playing and to help clean he kept at me and kept at me so i figured okay go with it. so i went outside and he showed me where it was and i told him that it was a plane then i second guessed myself and said no that aint its got green red and white init so then i told him it just a helicopter then well i noticed it was not moving i figured okay this is tooo weird. i knew that there was no such thing. but i am rethinking that now. i dont know how to explain its shape other than it was like the ones on the movies. the thing just sat there in the sky i got my binoculars and looked through them and the bottom was moving really really slow but it just sat in the sky. my kids are believeing in ufo's but me i really dont know i just think that if i had more to see or proven i would believe. i never lost sight but i gave up and went to bed at about 10:30 11 o'clock and it was still there
content.summary: Changing light colors very still

content.detailedDescription:
Traveling west on 23rd street from douglas street coming from the walgreens store. we past spencer road and i noticed what looked like contrails out it seemed in western okc or further. but i could not see any planes. i told my husband who was driving to look. we counted 7 of what we thought were contrails. then we thought maybe comets or space debris hitting the atmosphere. they were coming in in all different directions. they were going very fast and very high up. we decided to pull over just past mid west blvd. then we noticed to the left a jet fighter passing by with the same type contrails. he was to high up to have taken off from tinker. we just kept looking then we noticed a star like object to the right of the road. then another one to the left of the road. this was right before the  sun was setting. then the one on the right side of the road moved to where the other one was. and back and forth. then the left one moved, but we didn't notice it move as much. we just sat in the car and watched as another jet past us to the left going in the same direction. the lights just kept dancing in the sky while it seemed that jets were watching them. we decided to try to get a better view but as we drove further down 23rd we lost the view as we were going downhill. when we got back to a hill, we did not see any of it anymore.

we did not have the camera with us.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Unknown
content.summary: Moving stars

content.detailedDescription: I showed my mum the jerusalem video very quickly as she was standing in the hall way because i thought it was interesting, she then replyed- "that is the exact thing me and that lady saw standing outside the bingo hall that i was telling you about" thats when i remembered she told me a couple of weeks ago she saw a glowing orb like ball of light beside 4 or 5 flashing lights, she said she watched them for a few mins before the clouds coverd them. she also said that the lady next to her said "can you see what i'm seeing" and my mum replyed "yes" i dont know if that video posted on youtube about the ball of light is fake or not but i was very surprised my mother knew what it was. my mother told me how herself and that lady standing having a cigarette, during the bingo interval were the only ones outside and how she wished at that moment she had a video or a phone. my mum is not interested in that sort of thing, and i only ever look at the odd videos recomended on the net. and find it a wierd coincidence that she related to it.
content.summary: My mum saw the exact same thing as the jerusalem video posted jan 2011

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i had just arrived at our rural winneconne home. the temperature was around 30 degrees and the sky was clear. i had just gotten out of the vehicle and was going up on the back deck to enter the house when we heard what sounded like a military jet going overhead. this is unusual in our area at this time of year. i looked up and saw two lights, moving at a rapid rate across the sky, the front one moving more slowly while the one in back overtaking it. then the front one abruptly zigged, then zagged (my best description) then disappeared into the sky. the second light then also faded into the southwestern sky.
content.summary: 2 lights in night sky one of them zigzags

content.detailedDescription:
Continuation of event previously noted: there was so many i didnt think to count them until the ending of the event (which is still ongoing!) i was noticing several styles of orb's an ufo craft's. again since i have a sweeping 180 degree view of the valley i happen to be the lucky guy who got to see a spiritually mindblowing event! all night i stayed up watching them, trying to understand them. the one that was closest to me (approx 1/2 mile) had the disc shaped craft as from what i could see was supervising the orb's to do its command? as i could see the craft darting all over the skyline an from what i could tell, communicating with the orb's. heres where it gets strange. i'm a witness to a historical event! as i stated, it got strange, i heard a voice in my head stating, "do not be afraid!" and i communicated a thought back to them,it,whatever! "i'm not afraid!" i will not harm you! just, please, do not go away! an i'm not sure if that communication was rec'd back? but i was so sure this "voice" was close to me, that after i had time to consider the mental implication's of what happened i actually started to think that the voice had to of been sent from behind me as i am backed up to the black mountain's i think the "voice" came from secret pass, which is behind my position an to my left.Yet it was inside my head! i am part abenaki indian an something inside of me tells me these are ancient being's? i also wish to add that the feeling of wanting to defend them if nessessary also went thru my mind? an last night at approx 9:21 pm i had the feeling i was looking directly at the "leader's" craft, as it was gold toned and of course the flashing light's were very apparant almost like how our military leader's where their medal's an ampulets on their attire was the distinct way this craft looked an acted. all biz! an as they were all over the sky's, so to was this craft! an it appear's as they begin their upward accent this is done slowly as if their "collecting" something. we mere human's only at best get to see the bottom of the craft's an automatically assume, ah, its just a star. a very clever camoflauge! an the extraordinary thing is these craft never ever made a sound! until i thought to get out my native flute an strike a few cords to see if i could get any possible flashing directed back to me, but uh nope, sure didnt, i got a weird sound directed back to me, as if to say, "this is what i listen too!" from them. i truly hope my new found friend's are coming back tonite because i have slept lil since they burst onto my view! 
  my scottish blood that love's machine's, is so badly wanting to learn their engineering way's! also, i am not completely sure that the ufo's have to be near a military operation, a ancient site, and also some other parameter to be seen? i think these "being's" are capable of going anywhere! but the fact is kingman used to be a army base for testing stuff, missle's etc. an for the fact that behind my position here at the shack there is in the black mountain's, an old indian burial cite. are they gathering some "energy" from the ground? are they getting energy's from where the missile testing was done? is there something they collect from the power station's? also, i noticed two (every night) thus far, of the disc shaped craft's sit in the sky an simply hover between the opening of the valley on the kingman side an are possible sentinel's? while the "other's do their "mining"? an thats the rationale i gave it from being able to view the operation. an at first, from the beginning a part of me felt as though they were looking for something. from where they would hover, but then i changed my opinion in it after viewing the entire 5 night affair, that they are working, gathering something. whichever the case, this is definately extrordinary an am grateful to bear witness to it! i see that i'm out of space to type, an so much more!

content.detailedDescription: I was looking in the north sky over mason county, and noticed a triangle formation that i thought was three airplanes, the front one was a solid white lite with a blinking red , and the back two were blinking a reddish orange light.  they were heading west and once they got above lake michigan the front one curved south, and the two in the back disappeared.  when the front object was going to the south it was just a star like appearance without the red blink.
content.summary: Triangle formation, two disappeared one turned south over lake michigan.

content.detailedDescription: An incredible event which started last thurs at 1am i noticed a trapazoidal shaped object over whats called castle rock, estimate is 50 ft at its widest point hovering above the mtn top, flashing white,red,blue,yellow,green lights.I watched closely thru my spotting scope from my front yard at the base of the black mtn foothills on the other side of the valley, slowly the craft started unfolding itself into an hourglassed shape outlined in blue an the what i would term the body a beautiful lavender color. the shape ended up looking like a pyramid top touching a pyramid top but flat.(i also have a witness to this event)seemed to swirl around the air an flutter over the mountaintop to what appeared to be the middle of the valley approx 3500ft in the air over the maverick store where it cont'd in its hourglass shape, after 20 minutes it went an reconstructed itself back into its trapazoidal shape craft an began its upward climb very slowly an from my vantage point i was able to focus in on it an as it went overhead i saw a white light an this was i considered a great camoflauge accent because you are not able to see the lavender an blue coloration of flashing lights as it appears to look like a everyday run o the mill star. day 2 - began with 2 flashing orbs located somewhat near kingman,az an again i watched them closely thru my spotter scope an as i watched them i at that time realized there was many more of these orb's in different areas so i strained my scope an sure enough started noticing many orb's! all across the valley, behind me down to bhc, down to past mohave valley, all the way over to yucca on the otherside of the valley as far to the laft of me as chloride! i also saw an encounter with a regular plane an which that pilot made 3 fly-by's an it occurred to me that there is a good poss that pilot's cant see them if their above them!
content.distance: 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile, Unknown

content.detailedDescription: I went out for a sunday morning surf sesh with my brahs, and after about an hour i decided to head back inside for some grub and a monster energy drink, because shredding gnar requires optimum energy. after feasting i put my wetsuit back on and started paddling out and saw a huge fireball shaped thingy go over my bros. i thought it was an asteroid or somthing at first, we all did. they freaked and went under water, but i was far enough away to be chill. i watched it and it almost came to a complete stop, about triple over-head, then went away. nobody got abducted or anything, it was just wierd. after a while it just went away and we went inside and made digiorno pizza while we played cod. weve gone out with cameras the last few days trying to find it again but weve got nothing. i was hoping one of you guys could help.
content.summary: It flew over the water and then slowed down for a while and almost came to a stop, then continued

content.detailedDescription: It was dusky dark. i had stepped outside for a smoke when i just glanced up at the sky like i usually do just to take in the view of the stars when i saw an object that was flying directly over the house. it had 4 bright lights at the bottom of it which gave me a visual of the outline of this object. it was moving in an easterly to westerly direction and was not making a sound which was peculiar..Looking at this object which was probably about 2000-3000 ft.High i could tell it was not like anything i've ever seen fly over the house. if you was to take a half-a-dozen battleship carriers and put them side by side and twice that many in length then you would get a pretty good idea of the size and width of this thing..I did not have my camera on me at the time and was afraid to go inside the house and get it for fear that it would be gone by the time i got back outdoors. the night was crystal clear, not a cloud in the sky. it took prbably less than a minute and a half to disappear from sight..Alls i could do was shake my head and wonder if i was seeing things. i told my wife about it and described it to her and she said that she had seen something of a familiar shape back in the early 60's hovering over a graveyard that was behind their house. i posted what i saw on facebook and asked if anyone else in rome had seen it..Naturally the answer was no, and the people asked me was i sure i was smoking a cigg. and not something else.Hahaha..I know what i saw that evening. i live in a wooded area on the outskirts of rome in the woods. the direction it was going would have taken it almost over the city of rome..If anyone has seen something similar they can contact me at *(wit's email address removed--cms/sg) and let me know that i'm not hallucinating.Would love to see it again..
content.summary: Rectangular/huge

content.detailedDescription: I went outside for fresh air and saw a triangle of 4 lights 3 blinking one in the center not blinking so i ran inside and grabbed my camcorder and recorder the event it was very very high in the sky heading north i inhanshed the video but it didnt help clean it up but still you have a split second of it its clear enough great night in my opinion :)!!!!!!! btw at 1st thought it was a jet like the stealth cruser now not so much btw i will add the uncleaned up version of the video
content.summary: Tringle of light high in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way home from a bar in hamelton with my wife. we have about a 2 mile drive home. we live about 1/2 mile away from lake michigan, and 1/3rd mile away from a hospital, so we see airplanes and hellicopters all the time. i noticed a bright star out my car window.I thought my window was making a weird glare on the top part of the "star". i rolled the window down a bit to check and the arc of light was still there. at first i thought it might be the atmosphere making a halo on the star. i watched it get brighter and bigger. i started to think it was a plane getting closer,but then i realized the color wasn't right.Maybe a hellocopter. as it got closer i could see it blinking blue,green,white,and red(kinda orange}.By now it looked like two stars on top of each other with a multi-colored,fainter,wider,band of lights inbetween them.By now i didn't think this was a regular occurence.It was about a mile away and was travelling south about the same speed as a plane.I was thinking "naw couldn't be.....But i see it ".At that moment i saw another object about 1/2 mile behind it.It looked the same as the first one but it was diferent shades of orange in color.It was heading east and then south behind the first object.I was really excited by now and kept telling my wife,"i can't wait to get home to look at it better". i was hoping we could still see it by then.
       we pulled into the driveway and i lept out of the car to see.I hoped i wasn't just nutts.I wasn't. 
       i saw both objects slow down.The first traveled slowly s.E.About another mile.The orange one ascended about twice it's distace from the ground.They seemed to have stopped.I looked around and saw a total of 5 objects appered to be spread out from east to west in the sky.I had to do a reallity check.I really started to think i might be losing my marbles.These objects looked like doubble stacked stars but were brighter,with faint bands of colors inbetween.3 were like the first one ,and the other two were orangish.To anyone who was just glancing they wouldn't even notice. i wouldn't even believe it if i didn't see them flying so close.All of them seemed to be stationary....At first look.I could see small maneuvers side to side and up and down .I still couldn't beleive myself,"i must be loosin it,there just stars,....But icould see them flying,...I thought they were planes,.Are they stars?,stars dont travel and change direction,..No,...I know i saw these things ".I was in awe at what i witnessed but i know if i ever tell anyone they will tottaly think i'm crazy.
      i kept going ouside to verify to myself that it is real. the orange one stayed put.I could see the regular stars had moved.The first object  drifted to about 10 mi. s.E in 8 min(about 4 in.To my point of veiw).All others stayed put exept for small maneuvers.Stratus clouds were blowing in and i could see the first object was still visible below the clouds very clearly.
      i probably would've never reported this but my curiosity got the best of me .I wondered if anyone else saw something too today.When i looked up your site i saw a report close to the day,same state,and it looked to be very simmaler in description.May be connected.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Driving home and saw a star- like light out the window. it had a 70 degee halo on the top. blue,white yellow,red, and green random lights.

content.detailedDescription: Ok, i can't believe im doing this but i did see a ufo last december 2010 looking out on the back lake dock at lake giles in orlando, fl.  i did try to video tape it but it wasn't that great of a video to post.  there is orlando international airport about 10 mins. south of me and i see planes and ect. all the time.  this light was much differnt as i sat out on the dock with my dog i always look up at the sky and that night just before christmas i saw a light in the sky slowly pulsating from white to red...It wasnt like any plane light i've seen many times.  it was exciting for me enough to take a video of it now im not saying it was from another planet but i do believe that its crazy to not leave that open.  when i was a kid around 1990 i live in illinios and went out to watch the northern lights and saw 3 ufos that i tried to get my parents to go out and see them too but they just sat in front of the tv laughing at me...Then a few years later when i was in high school i was with a bunch of friends one night and one of them started talking about the ufos she saw the night of the northern lights a few years back and i felt so much better that she saw the same thing i did and she was also very excited because she was made fun of and the 2 friends she was with when they told people.  now the ones i saw over 20 years ago were more convincing becauce they were closer to the ground in seemed and were triangle with a slow pulsating red light in the middle.  they also moved allot fast then stopped and turned more 90 degrees..Which i was only a kid back then but i knew better that that and how all other planes i saw fly.  again though it could be a secret government plane, but i dont rule out that its from "somewere else".  if anyone else saw that same "ufo" over orlando, fl it would be nice not to be alone.
content.summary: Ufo in orando, fl and one in il when i was a kid around 1990

content.detailedDescription:
This video was taken at 11pm in berkeley california. it is a recording of a orb-like ufo (on camera although i could make out a bizarre torch-like figure in the moonlight). the ufo caught my attention as i entered onto the i-80 freeway because the red light emanating off the object was too strong and steady to be normal. the light didn't flicker or change from its red, which usually happens with planes. so i kept my gaze as i drove (not a safe thing to do). had a feeling this craft wasn't normal so i pulled to the side of the freeway and began recording it through my opened window. now the coolest part, and maybe the most mysterious part of the video is, the ufo just disappears. this happens after you see it come next to the moon. now what i saw, and which the video does not show, is the ufo's red light slowly dimming or getting smaller as if it is turning it off or it rose in elevation fast enough to alter the size of the light to a significant degree. the object eventually disappeared. in the video, you can see that i got out my car to get a better angle of the object but nothing can be seen. i could see it with the naked eye still so that is why the video phone was still positioned at a particular place. the ufo was definitely not a typical craft nor was it a saucer shaped object. the video is my proof that what i am saying is absolutely true. check it out: 

*(link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg).
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ufo seen over bay area in california and video of the object shot next to a freeway

content.detailedDescription: I was walking with my brother down the road when we both looked up at what first glance was the moon, upon studying it we realized it was not. we started to walk he oppisite direction and the object followed. we walked into the woods hoping to get closer. at one point we decided it was nothing and started walking home once again. as we glanced back we realized it got dimmer and dimmer as we walked away. i felt the need to investigate further and my brother needed no convincing. once we started back toward the object into the woods we noticed that the object resumed gettin brighter. it was a pitch black night and the light casted shadows it was so bright. it is hard to believe but the light gae off a spotlight like beam like it was guiding us through the woods. several times we looked at each other and made sure we were both seeing the same thing and not just imagining things. i felt like a kid on a feild trip, who was being guided by a trusted teacher. after a ways we came upon a clearing. at that point my brother stood transfixed staring at the light.I said his name several times with no responce, i kept it up untill he calmy stated noah everything is fine stop bothering me, or something to that extent. we continued on and ended up at an electricity plant. feet growing cold and the late hour made us turn and go home
content.summary: Golden
